name: Iron
desc: Guild Trial: Bronze is unlocked when you have a score of 70 at the end of Week 8. If you pass the trial, your Mercenary Group Rank will upgrade to Bronze.

name: Bronze
desc: Guild Trial: Silver is unlocked when you have a score of 160. If you pass the trial, your Mercenary Group Rank will upgrade to Silver.

name: Silver
desc: Guild Trial: Gold is unlocked when you have a score of 320. If you pass the trial, your Mercenary Group Rank will upgrade to Gold.

name: Gold
desc: Guild Trial: Platinum is unlocked when you have a score of 480. If you pass the trial, your Mercenary Group Rank will upgrade to Platinum.

name: Platinum
desc: Guild Trial: Radiant is unlocked when you have a score of 60 . If you pass the trial, your Mercenary Group Rank will upgrade to Radiant.
